cards.name: The Fool
cards.description: We are often ignorant of the path ahead. Innocence can lead us into uncertainty. Tread lightly.

cards.name: The Magician
cards.description: Magick begins with the singular act of creation. To find our way, we often must look inward for the spark.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.description: Following our intuition is often the best course of action. Our unconscious often sees things our eyes miss, or choose not to see.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.description: This card indicates fertility and love. It is a good time to look for comfort in one's home.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.description: A sign of authority and domination, or administrative powers. The father-like Emperor seeks power at all cost.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.description: Traditional values dominate under the influence of Taurus. Religious ceremonies are implied.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.description: A strong relationship is implied, one that values communication and charity. Happiness follows.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.description: The chariot is a vehicle for travel. Movement and success are indicated, but may require a great effort.

cards.name: Strength
cards.description: Control and courage are shown. You have what it takes to endure any challenge and overcome any obstacle.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.description: A time of study is indicated, where the analytical mind can be nurtured. Solitude and meditation can be helpful.

cards.name: The Wheel of Fortune
cards.description: Destiny has intervened. Now is the time to act because luck is on your side. You can't fail.

cards.name: Justice
cards.description: A symbol of the scales. All things are measured and accountable. Legal matters are implied.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.description: Neptune offers enlightenment. A reversal is in order. Personal struggle and sacrifice lead to seeing things from a new perspective.

cards.name: Death
cards.description: All things must come to end. We many experience several spiritual deaths in our life. They are often a chance to start fresh.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.description: All things in moderation. Balance the intellectual with the spiritual. It may be time to exercise caution.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.description: Feelings of entrapment surround you. You are focusing so much on the goal you've neglected everything else.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.description: Mars, the god of war, has brought havoc to your world. Sudden, massive change sweeps everything away.

cards.name: The Star
cards.description: A good sign for those seeking success! Everyone will see your talent soon. Get ready for the big time!

cards.name: The Moon
cards.description: Something is lurking beneath the surface. Your unconscious is trying to open your eyes to something hidden.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.description: This card represents a person's full life force. Vitality, regeneration, and joy are all suggested by The Sun.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.description: The god of the underworld brings something up from below. A revelation is at hand. Prepare for an awakening.

cards.name: The World
cards.description: The World is the final goal of the Major Arcana. It represents completion and wisdom. An open mind is indicated.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.description: A new opportunity will be presented, but it's up to you to act upon it.

cards.name: Two of Wands
cards.description: What does one do with success? Learning to take maters into your own hands is not always easy.

cards.name: Three of Wands
cards.description: Sometimes it's necessary to turn your back on a situation and cut ties with the past. It can lead to long-term improvements.

cards.name: Four of Wands
cards.description: It's time for relaxing and socializing with friends. Use this opportunity to get out and live your life.

cards.name: Five of Wands
cards.description: Conflict is everywhere. Your struggle feels epic and unwinnable, but it's important to keep fighting and not give up.

cards.name: Six of Wands
cards.description: This is the card of victory over one's enemies. It can indicate great leadership skills.

cards.name: Seven of Wands
cards.description: You are feeling defensive. Imaginary assailants comes at you from the dark. Some of them may be in your imagination.

cards.name: Eight of Wands
cards.description: This is the card of speed. It could mean travel, or a sudden change of course. Fear not, the end is near.

cards.name: Nine of Wands
cards.description: When you feel your back against the wall, you may be facing more than you can handle. It is the time for caution.

cards.name: Ten of Wands
cards.description: The journey will soon come to and end, the destination is in sight, but a huge effort is needed now to finish the job.

cards.name: Page of Wands
cards.description: New ideas are formulation. This card suggest youthful energy and a good start to new projects.

cards.name: Knight of Wands
cards.description: The Knight is a champion of ideals and philosophical beliefs. He will not back down from a challenge.

cards.name: Queen of Wands
cards.description: Calm and collected, the Queen is stable in her position and need not fear anyone. She trusts her instincts.

cards.name: King of Wands
cards.description: This King represents strength and inspiration. He brings matters to their conclusion once and for all.

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.description: This card often represents a new love or relationship. You will have the chance to fall in love.

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.description: Harmony and balance are implied. Your communication skills may lead to unexpected gains.

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.description: A celebration is at hand. You could see an invitation to a party, or a dance. Now is a good time to enjoy oneself.

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.description: Something unexpected is offered. Do you accept it? Or do you let the opportunity slip by?

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.description: Difficulties and disappointment come for us all. The sadness washes over us, and takes our pain with it.

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.description: People from your past may suddenly resurface, or feelings of nostalgia may be playing an important role. Listen to your dreams for guidance.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.description: You are lost in a world of illusions. Your mind wonders between nightmares and dreams. Stay focused to escape the phantasm.

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.description: It could be a good idea to distance yourself from your problems at this time. It's okay to take time for yourself.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.description: Emotional satisfaction and contentment are indicated. Feelings of self-worth are well earned. Experience shows itself in your work.

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.description: This could be a family gathering or other celebration. Either way, it shows happiness and contentment: a life with meaning.

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.description: New feelings of love, new anticipations, and uncharted territories come with this card. Your emotions will guide you into a new experience.

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.description: Being able to voice your feelings is important. The Knight of Cups feels no shame in his feelings. He hold his cup with a steady hand.

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.description: This card shows contentment, especially with one's home. The Queen is stable in her domain, but filled with passion.

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.description: An emotional event has come to and end, and the King's passion is renewed. He is full of feelings of resolution.

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.description: This is the card of triumph and victory. It can indicate that one is starting down a new path and in control.

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.description: Patience is needed. Sometimes it's best to let's events flow of their own accord. A choice may be required of you.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.description: Heartache strikes like a bolt of lightning. Distance and detachment come after a terrible loss.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.description: When this card appears, it can mean a physical death is near. Patience and rest are necessary now.

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.description: A card of battles. Victory comes, but at what cost? This card can mean someone is watching.

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.description: Like a flowing river, change is constant. A change of perspective may be coming. Expect to travel.

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.description: This is a card of deception. Someone could be playing you for the fool, or you may be behind enemy lines.

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.description: You may feel surrounded, cut off from allies. The path of escape is hidden from view. Look inward. What you seek is near you.

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.description: Anxiety and despair engulf you. Life feels like a nightmare. You stand on the edge of a dark abyss.

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.description: The end has arrived. The hero is dismembered and a great catharsis occurs. A spiritual awakening may follow.

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.description: New paths need steady hands to forge them. The Page of Swords knows what he wants and he seeks it ambitiously.

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.description: No other Knight can compete with this one. When he puts his mind to something, the world trembles in anticipation.

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.description: The Queen of Swords seeks truth. Her resolve is unbreakable. Her mind is fixed. Her ideals are strong.

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.description: The master of rational thought, the King of Swords sits on the edge of his throne. He has fought hard battles. He has paid the price of power.

cards.name: Ace of Pentacles
cards.description: A material reward is on its way. It could be a raise at work, an unexpected gift, or a new opportunity.

cards.name: Two of Pentacles
cards.description: This card can indicate problems with money. It can also mean instability, and the need to look at both sides of the coin, so to speak.

cards.name: Three of Pentacles
cards.description: Artistic talent and creativity reach their maturity in the diligent craftsman. One's work is judged by the masters, and well received.

cards.name: Four of Pentacles
cards.description: A miserly attitude is indicated. One holds onto material things at the expense of spiritual fulfillment. Flexibility is necessary.

cards.name: Five of Pentacles
cards.description: This card represents insecurity. Hard times have come, and one's resources are limited. Without support from family and friends, you may be left in the cold.

cards.name: Six of Pentacles
cards.description: When this card shows up, it can mean winning money. An unexpected gift may also be coming, or a major debt will be repaid.

cards.name: Seven of Pentacles
cards.description: It's time to look back and appreciate your hard work. Part of growth is analyzing that growth and learning from your past.

cards.name: Eight of Pentacles
cards.description: Diligence and hard work are implied. You may be getting a second job or working long hours. Difficult, but rewarding times are here.

cards.name: Nine of Pentacles
cards.description: Reaping one's reward is the meaning of this card. Your hard work has paid off and now you can enjoy the fruits of your labor.

cards.name: Ten of Pentacles
cards.description: One meaning of this card is getting recognized for one's talents. It could also mean winning a large sum of money, or receiving an inheritance.

cards.name: Page of Pentacles
cards.description: This card represents a practical minded person who is good with their finances. They have a talent for making money and the ambition to use it.

cards.name: Knight of Pentacles
cards.description: This Knight cares only about what it can hold in his hands. His actions must have results. His movements are taken with the utmost determination.

cards.name: Queen of Pentacles
cards.description: She touches the earth from her throne. She has the confidence that comes from material comfort. She may be a widower.

cards.name: King of Pentacles
cards.description: This King is the master of the Earth. His rule is as old as time, and as bountiful. He brings growth and prosperity to everything he touches.
